title: Introduction to C Programming
detail: Learn the basics of C programming language. Understand variables, loops, arrays, and more.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
detail: Explore fundamental algorithms and data structures. Analyze algorithm complexity.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
detail: Master C++ basics for Data Structures and Algorithms. Learn about classes, objects, and more.

title: Basic Data Structures
detail: Get hands-on with essential data structures like arrays, linked lists, and trees.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
detail: Learn object-oriented programming concepts in Python. Understand classes, inheritance, and more.

title: Software Engineering
detail: Explore software development life cycle, testing, and project management.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
detail: Dive into Amazon Web Services and cloud computing concepts. Learn to deploy and manage applications.

title: Database (MySQL)
detail: Gain proficiency in MySQL database management. Learn about queries, indexing, and more.

title: Problem-Solving Part
detail: Hone your problem-solving skills with a variety of algorithmic challenges and puzzles.
